name: Cran-Lemon Mini Loaves
preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 350° F. Using Basting Brush, lightly oil four Mini Loaf Pans and place on Sheet Pan.
  2. In a large bowl, whisk together eggs, yogurt, and oil. Stir in mix.   
  3. Scrape batter into pans; smooth top.
  4. Bake 21—23 min. Cool in pans 10 min; unmold and transfer to Cooling Racks.  
  5. To make glaze, mix icing sugar with lemon juice. Drizzle over warm loaves.
tips: Instead of using the oven, microwave mini loaves in pans, uncovered, on high for 3 min. Rest in pans 2 min before unmolding. If your microwave is equipped with a turntable, place the loaf pans around the edge of the turntable to avoid crowding around the centre and ensure even cooking.
